document_data.mainbody:
Barth''' is a common name in the Realms and can refer to:

* [[Barth (Daggerford)]], a fighter in the Daggerford militia during the mid 14{{th}} century DR,
* [[Barth (adventurer)]], an adventurer in the Western Heartlands during the late 15{{th}} century DR,
* [[Barth (Scardale)]], a soldier and resistance fighter from [[Scardale Town]], or
* Barth that appeared in the novel ''[[Elfshadow]]''.

{{Disambig}}
